title: Glasgow 1980
creator_credit: Oscar Marzaroli, City of Glascow, Films of Scotland and Ogam Films
brief_description: The urban renewal of Glasgow. The biggest urban renewal in Europe. A 20 year program begun in 1960 involving 550 miles or one twelth of the City area. Shows what has been achieved and what will be achieved by 1980. Editing by Bill Forsyth. Narrated by Michael Harrigan.
creator_credit_for_label: Oscar Marzaroli, City of Glascow, Films of Scotland and Ogam Films
